featureDescription.name: casProcessorId
featureDescription.description: The unique identifier of the CAS processor that added this annotation to the CAS

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: The confidence level assigned to the Annotation by the CAS processor that created it.

featureDescription.name: elements
featureDescription.description: An array containing pointers to the individual elements contained within the NGram.

featureDescription.name: elementType
featureDescription.description: The type of the elements contained in the elements field.

featureDescription.name: ngramOrder
featureDescription.description: The order (or degree) of the ngram: 1 (unigram), 2 (bigram), 3 (trigram), and so on.

featureDescription.name: source
featureDescription.description: The source of the NGram (i.e. was the NGram created from Question text or Answer text?).

featureDescription.name: isCorrect
featureDescription.description: Flag that indicates whether this Answer is correct or not, based upon the original text file.

featureDescription.name: score
featureDescription.description: The score (correctness) of the Answer. Generated by heuristic or model.

featureDescription.name: answer
featureDescription.description: A reference to the Answer annotation that generated this score.
